SELECT knowledge_point,AVG(score) AS ave_score FROM second_knowledge_points sk,subjective_answer sa WHERE exam_id=#{examId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM subjective_question sq WHERE sa.question_id=sq.id AND sk.knowledge_point=sq.second_level_knowledge_point AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM student_exam se WHERE sa.student_id=se.student_id AND sa.exam_id=se.exam_id AND se.is_finished=1 ) ) GROUP BY knowledge_point
